channel.title: By this error my server keeps crashing omfg!
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String ind ex out of range: 20 at java.lang.String.getChars(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(Unknown Source) at client.savemoreinfo(client.java:28865) at client.process(client.java:15297) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:48)[/code]
someone help me? what does this one means?
